channel.title: Making a client for my server, almost completed
channel.description:
Hi, I am making a client for my server. I got everything perfect... except... I don't know how to change the name of the 'Run' thing and a message pops up when you open it.
It says 'Galkon's Anarchy' in the pop up, and in the run it says 'Galkons Anarchy' and stuff about the Galkon Client...
How would I change this to TriCombat Client in both of those instances?

item.title: Making a client for my server, almost completed
item.dc:creator: @doomsword222 doomsword222
item.description:
@doomsword222 wrote:

Not to be a total noob, but what is the .bat file’s name? (I actually am a total noob at clients and parts of servers tbh)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 01, 2008, 11:21:24 am[/size][hr]The kind of client I’m working with has the music bar, file, etc. Just like the Moparscape client.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a client for my server, almost completed

item.title: Making a client for my server, almost completed
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Right click the .bat file , edit and there you go.

And go into the GUI file and search for “galkon” Change that.

Peace.

Read full topic
